cause.description:
-Every two and a half minutes, somewhere in America, someone is sexually assaulted.
-One in six American women are victims of sexual assault, and one in 33 men.
-In 2004-2005, there were an average annual 200,780 victims of rape, attempted rape or sexual assault.
-About 44% of rape victims are under age 18, and 80% are under age 30.
-Since 1993, rape/sexual assault has fallen by over 69%.
Let's keep up the progress.
For more information, visit RAINN at http://www.rainn.org/
If you would like to make a direct donation instead of making one through facebook, here are a few ways:
A straight donation, with options to donate in the name of a loved one, donate an old car, and a lot of other options: http://www.rainn.org/donate/donate.php
Buy RAINN merchandise: http://www.rainn.org/donate/index.php
Buy merchandise from other places that give a portion of the proceeds to RAINN: http://www.rainn.org/donate/shopping-for-rainn.html
1. Victims of sexual violence need assistance
2. America needs education to prevent sexual assault
cause.mission: Improve services for victims of sexual violence, prevent sexual violence
cause.name: Rape, Abuse & Incest National Network
